articles.content: Malaika Arora has been exuding supermodel energy for decades now and there is no sign of her stopping anytime soon. A case in point is Malaika's latest fashion outing that screams glamorous. The mode… [+1888 chars]

articles.title: Dibakar Banerjee highlights the harsh reality of Sushant Singh Rajput’s death - Bollywood Life
articles.description: Dibakar Banerjee claims no one actually cared about Sushant Rajput's untimely demise but was only interested in spicy gossip.
articles.content: Dibakar Banerjee worked with Sushant Singh Rajput in Byomkesh Bakshy which was the late actor's finest performance till date. Sushant's death left many shattered and numb as it was something that no … [+1851 chars]
